items.text: more round-arm from Jadhav. Full on off, and tapped off the front foot back to the bowler
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: good length just outside off stump. Skids through as he tries to cut. Misses
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: bowls this from below sea level. Lands on off as Liton backs away to cut. Mistimed to point
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: good length just outside off stump. Just 83 kph as Liton tries to muscle this square off the back foot. The cut finds point once again
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: full on middle, and Liton walks across to the off side on this occasion. Works it off his pads to the vacant square-leg region for one
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, and pushed off the front foot to mid off. Just a single off Jadhav's over
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: almost chopped on! Length ball angling in, and he tries to dab this fine to third man. Inside-edges the shot right onto his boots
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, no run

items.text: good length angling in once again. Liton tries to nudge this towards the off side, but the ball takes an inside edge onto his body once again. The dots are building up
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, no run

items.text: fuller, and outside off stump. He leans into the cover drive, but can't seem to find the gap. Straight to Rohit at cover
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and he sticks his bat out to steer a late cut past point
items.shortText: Bumrah to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and he flays a back-foot cut straight to Jadeja at point. Picks up and throws the ball in one single motion, but it can't find the non-striker's stumps
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and steered off the back foot to Dhawan at third man for a jogging single
items.shortText: Bumrah to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: uses his feet Full on off, and he dances down the wicket. Swings across the line, and smashes this over midwicket for a much-needed maximum!
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: full just outside off stump, and he walks down the wicket to tap a check-drive to long on for one
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length ball on off, and skidding straight through. Liton makes room and cuts this in front of square to deep extra cover
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, and he makes room to the leg side. Carves it off the back foot past cover point for a single
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: good length on middle stump, and clipped off his hips to square leg with soft hands
items.shortText: Jadhav to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, and cut away off the back foot to point. Dot to end the over.
items.postText: Final ten overs. Can Bangladesh go past 250? Find out with Varun as he takes control once again.
items.shortText: Jadhav to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off, backs away and stabs it past short third man
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: googly is dropped short outside off. He drags the pull between deep square and deep midwicket
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: lovely. Steps out to meet this at the pitch and lofts it straight over the bowler to beat long-on to his left
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length outside off, allows it to turn into the him and once again, gets it to dribble past short third man
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, 2 runs

items.text: googly on leg stump, cops it on the body as he looks to sweep this
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, no run

items.text: looks a close stumping appeal. Liton has played this on line - because it is wide, he expects it to turn in. Goes for the flick. But this is a googly. He has his back toe on the line...and not behind it. Liton's gone by the smallest of margins. Margins brought about by the bowler's clever set up and Dhoni's quick hands. It needed something that good to get this man today. He has singlehandedly kept Bangladesh in this final after singhlehandedly making India feel the pressure for most of this innings. A sublime maiden century.
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Liton Das, OUT

dismissal.text: Liton Das st †Dhoni b Kuldeep Yadav 121 (117b 12x4 2x6) SR: 103.41

items.text: length on off stump, pushed flat on off stump. Pushed to midwicket with the turn
items.shortText: Chahal to Soumya Sarkar, no run
